TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SmtpFailedRecipientsException extends System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when e-mail is sent using an and cannot be delivered to all recipients.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A> property contains the exceptions received while attempting to send e-mail. The e-mail might have been successfully delivered to some of the recipients.
## Examples The following code example resends an e-mail message that was not delivered because a mailbox was busy or unavailable.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#27](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.net.mail.smtpfa_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NclMailSync#27](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.net.mail.smtpfa_1.cs)]
